for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    x = n
    y = 0
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    store = []
    for i in range(n + 1):
        store.append([a[i], i])
    store.sort()
    for i in range(n):
        print(store[y][1], store[y][0], store[x][1], k - store[y][0])
        store[x][0] -= k - store[y][0]
        if store[x][0] < k:
            store[y] = store[x]
            x -= 1
        else:
            y += 1

for t in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    x = n
    y = 0
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    store = []
    for i in range(n + 1):
        store.append([a[i], i])
    store.sort()
    for i in range(n):
        print(store[y][1], store[y][0], store[x][1], k - store[y][0])
        store[x][0] -= k - store[y][0]
        if store[x][0] < k:
            store[y] = store[x]
            x -= 1
        else:
            y += 1

def answer():
    all = [[a[i], i] for i in range(n + 1)]
    all.sort()
    (p1, p2) = (0, n)
    for i in range(n):
        if all[p1][0] >= k:
            v1 = k
            all[p1][0] -= v1
        else:
            v1 = all[p1][0]
            all[p1][0] -= v1
        v2 = min(k - v1, all[p2][0])
        all[p2][0] -= v2
        print(all[p1][1], v1, all[p2][1], v2)
        if all[p2][0] < k:
            all[p1] = all[p2]
            p2 -= 1
            p1 -= 1
        p1 += 1
for T in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    answer()

def answer():
    all = [[a[i], i] for i in range(n + 1)]
    all.sort()
    (p1, p2) = (0, n)
    for i in range(n):
        if all[p1][0] >= k:
            v1 = k
            all[p1][0] -= v1
        else:
            v1 = all[p1][0]
            all[p1][0] -= v1
        v2 = min(k - v1, all[p2][0])
        all[p2][0] -= v2
        print(all[p1][1], v1, all[p2][1], v2)
        if all[p2][0] < k:
            all[p1] = all[p2]
            p2 -= 1
            p1 -= 1
        p1 += 1
for T in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    answer()

import math
T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l = []
    indx = 0
    for i in arr:
        l.append([indx, i])
        indx += 1
    l.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
    st = 0
    en = n
    for i in range(n):
        (m1, c1, m2, c2) = (0, 0, 0, 0)
        m1 = l[st][1]
        m2 = k - m1
        c1 = l[st][0]
        c2 = l[en][0]
        l[en][1] -= m2
        if l[en][1] < k:
            l[st] = l[en]
            en -= 1
        else:
            st += 1
        print(c1, m1, c2, m2)

            x -= 1
